title.rendered: Northern Thunderbird Air in British Columbia, Canada

content.rendered:
NT Air or Northern Thunderbird Air Inc. is a Canadian charter airline with a head office at Prince George, British Columbia and bases in Vancouver and Smithers. NT Air was formed in 1971.

 

 

Northern Thunderbird Air Address, Phone, Email, Fax, Working hours

Address : Prince George (Head Office)
#100 – 4245 Hangar Rd
Prince George, BC V2N 4M6

Phone: (250) 963-9611
Toll-Free: (800) 963-9611

Fax: (250) 963-8422

Email id :info@ntair.ca

Northern Thunderbird Air Official website :https://www.ntair.ca/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Northern Thunderbird Air 

Fleet size: 14

  • Beechcraft 1900
  • Beechcraft Super King Air

Northern Thunderbird Air Offices

Vancouver
Smithers
Calgary

Queries handled by Northern Thunderbird Air Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Northern Thunderbird Air  Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Northern Thunderbird Air: (click on the stars below)
